00201     DistMatrixReadProxy<DataType,DataType,MC,MR> XProxy(*fp_input);

Definition at line 223 of file lbann_layer_softmax.cpp.

00223                                                         {
00224     // Compute the cost function
00225     // cost=-1/m*(sum(sum(groundTruth.*log(a3))))
00226     DataType avg_error = 0.0, total_error = 0.0;
00227     EntrywiseMap(*Acts, (std::function<DataType(DataType)>)([](DataType z)->DataType{return log(z);}));
00228 
00229     Hadamard(Y, *Acts, Acts_Cost);
00230     Zeros(m_minibatch_cost, m_mini_batch_size, 1);
00231     ColumnSum(Acts_Cost, m_minibatch_cost);
00232 
00233     // Sum the local, total error
00234     const Int local_height = m_minibatch_cost.LocalHeight();
00235     for(int r = 0; r < local_height; r++) {
00236       total_error += m_minibatch_cost.GetLocal(r, 0);
00237     }
00238     total_error = mpi::AllReduce(total_error, m_minibatch_cost.DistComm());
00239 
00240     avg_error = -1.0 * total_error / m_mini_batch_size;
00241     return avg_error;
00242 }

Apply the layer's linear update in forward propagation.

Reimplemented from lbann::Layer.

Definition at line 125 of file lbann_layer_softmax.cpp.

00126 {
00127   // _Z = WB * Xs                                               -- Xs is previous layer Activations
00128   // ZsColMax[c,0] = max(_Z[0..numNeurons-1, c])                -- (m_mini_batch_size x 1)
00129   // ZsNorm[r,c] = _Z[r,c] - ZsColMax[c,0]                      -- Column-wise normalized Zs matrix: _Z[r,c] - ZsColMax[1,c]
00130   // ZsNormExp[r,c] = exp(ZsNorm[r,c])
00131   // ZsNormExpSum[c,0] = sum(ZsNormExp[0..numNeurons-1, c])     -- Column-wise sum over normalized, exponentiated _Z
00132   // _Y[r,c] = ZsNormExp[r,c] / ZsNormExpSum[c,0]               -- exp(norm(_Z[r,c])) = Sum(exp(norm(Zs[r,c])))
00133 
00134   // Convert forward prop matrix to MC,MR format
00135   // TODO: store this matrix for back prop
00136   DistMatrixReadProxy<DataType,DataType,MC,MR> XProxy(_X);
00137   DistMat& X = XProxy.Get();
00138 
00139   // Apply linear transform
00140   Gemm(NORMAL, NORMAL, (DataType) 1.0, _WB, X, (DataType) 0.0, _Z);
00141 
00142   // For each minibatch (column) find the maximimum value
00143   Zeros(ZsColMax, m_mini_batch_size, 1);
00144   ColumnMax((DistMat&) _Z, ZsColMax);
00145 
00146   // Redistribute the per-minibatch maximum values
00147   Copy(ZsColMax, ZsColMaxStar);
00148 
00149   // Compute exp(z) of each entry. Subtract the max of each column from its
00150   // entries to prevent the exp from blowing up. Large negative values are
00151   // expected to underflow to 0.
00152   IndexDependentMap(
00153     _Z,
00154     (std::function<DataType(int,int,DataType)>)
00155     ([this](int r, int c, DataType z)->DataType {
00156       Int rL = this->ZsColMaxStar.LocalRow(c);
00157       return std::exp(z - this->ZsColMaxStar.GetLocal(rL, 0));
00158     }));
00159 
00160   // For each minibatch (column) sum up the exponentiated values
00161   Zeros(ZsNormExpSum, m_mini_batch_size, 1);
00162   //  ColSumMat ZsNormExpSum;
00163   ColumnSum((DistMat&) _Z /*ZsNormExp*/, ZsNormExpSum);
00164   Copy(ZsNormExpSum, ZsNormExpSumStar);
00165 
00166   // Divide each entry: exp(x_ij) / Sum_i(exp(x_ij))
00167   Copy(_Z /*ZsNormExp*/, _Y);
00168   IndexDependentMap(_Y,
00169                     (std::function<DataType(Int,Int,DataType)>)([this /*ZsNormExpSum*/](Int r, Int c, DataType z)->
00170                                                                 DataType{Int rL = this->ZsNormExpSumStar.LocalRow(c); return z/this->ZsNormExpSumStar.GetLocal(rL,0);}));
00171 
00172 #if 0
00173   ColSumMat Ycheck(_Y.Grid());

00175   ColumnSum((DistMat&) _Y /*ZsNormExp*/, Ycheck);
00176   StarMat YcheckStar(_Y.Grid());

00178   DataType sum = 0.0;

void lbann::SoftmaxLayer::setup ( int  numPrevNeurons  )  [virtual]

Reimplemented from lbann::Layer.

Definition at line 60 of file lbann_layer_softmax.cpp.

00060                                                 {
00061   Layer::setup(numPrevNeurons);
00062     if(optimizer != NULL) {
00063       optimizer->setup(numPrevNeurons+1, NumNeurons);
00064     }
00065 
00066     // Initialize weight-bias matrix
00067     Zeros(*WB, NumNeurons, numPrevNeurons+1);
00068 
00069     // Initialize weights
00070     DistMat weights;
00071     View(weights, *WB, IR(0,NumNeurons), IR(0,numPrevNeurons));
00072     switch(m_weight_initialization) {
00073     case weight_initialization::uniform:
00074       uniform_fill(weights, weights.Height(), weights.Width(),
00075                    DataType(0), DataType(1));
00076       break;
00077     case weight_initialization::normal:
00078       gaussian_fill(weights, weights.Height(), weights.Width(),
00079                     DataType(0), DataType(1));
00080       break;
00081     case weight_initialization::glorot_normal: {
00082       const DataType var = 2.0 / (numPrevNeurons + NumNeurons);
00083       gaussian_fill(weights, weights.Height(), weights.Width(),
00084                     DataType(0), sqrt(var));
00085       break;
00086     }
00087     case weight_initialization::glorot_uniform: {
00088       const DataType var = 2.0 / (numPrevNeurons + NumNeurons);
00089       uniform_fill(weights, weights.Height(), weights.Width(),
00090                    DataType(0), sqrt(3*var));
00091       break;
00092     }
00093     case weight_initialization::he_normal: {
00094       const DataType var = 1.0 / numPrevNeurons;
00095       gaussian_fill(weights, weights.Height(), weights.Width(),
00096                     DataType(0), sqrt(var));
00097       break;
00098     }
00099     case weight_initialization::he_uniform: {
00100       const DataType var = 1.0 / numPrevNeurons;
00101       uniform_fill(weights, weights.Height(), weights.Width(),
00102                    DataType(0), sqrt(3*var));
00103       break;
00104     }
00105     case weight_initialization::zero: // Zero initialization is default
00106     default:
00107       Zero(weights);
00108       break;
00109     }
00110 
00111     // Initialize other matrices
00112     Zeros(*WB_D, NumNeurons, numPrevNeurons + 1);
00113     Zeros(*Ds, NumNeurons, m_mini_batch_size);
00114     Zeros(*Ds_Temp, numPrevNeurons + 1, m_mini_batch_size); // Ds_Temp holds the product of WB^T * Ds
00115     Zeros(*Zs, NumNeurons, m_mini_batch_size);
00116     Zeros(*Acts, NumNeurons, m_mini_batch_size);
00117     Zeros(Acts_Cost, NumNeurons, m_mini_batch_size);
00118     Zeros(m_minibatch_cost, m_mini_batch_size, 1);
00119 }
